main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.mmproperties

Class MMPropertiesRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.mmproperties.MMPropertiesRegistry

  • public class MMPropertiesRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Class referencing the devices loaded in Micro-Manager and their device properties.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

    • Constructor Detail

      • MMPropertiesRegistry

        public MMPropertiesRegistry(mmcorej.CMMCore core)
        Constructor. Calls a private initialization method to extract the devices and their properties. It ignores "COM" devices.
        Parameters:
        core - Micro-manager core

        Returns:

      • isProperty

        public boolean isProperty(java.lang.String hash)
        Checks if hash corresponds to a known Micro-manager device property.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash to be tested
        Returns:
        True if the hash corresponds to a device property, false otherwise.

      • clearAllListeners

        public void clearAllListeners()
        Clears all Micro-manager device property listeners (which are of the class UIProperty). Called during reloading of the system by the SystemController.
